channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-22321] Setting default nulls last does not take effect when order direction is specified
item.description:
SET hive.default.nulls.last=true;
SELECT * FROM t_test ORDER BY col1 ASC;

POSTHOOK: query: SELECT * FROM t_test ORDER BY col1 ASC
POSTHOOK: type: QUERY
POSTHOOK: Input: default@t_test
#### A masked pattern was here ####
NULL
NULL
NULL
NULL
3
5
5

https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/cb83da943c8919e2ab3751244de5c2879c8fda1d/ql/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/parse/HiveParser.g#L2510

 

cc. jcamachorodriguez
item.summary: Setting default nulls last does not take effect when order direction is specified

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
